title: Cannot Install R-Zoo with R@3.4.0: "Package glib has no variant set ['patches']"
body:
Hi 

The #5293 issue has re-appeared for me.  I have no idea why.

I am at:

```
[root@node118 spack]# git log | head
commit 8c306b7b83cfa7debae20461d036631f0c9f6e5f
Author: Yifan Zhu <ifanzhu@foxmail.com>
Date:   Tue Oct 24 07:07:45 2017 -0500

    r-minfi: created new package (#5887)

commit 37ce53c48fb26c145cf9f681d104deb0ddc31809
Author: 健美猫 <weijianwen@gmail.com>
Date:   Tue Oct 24 17:39:38 2017 +0800

```

So to get rid of the ```jpeg``` not found issue I reinstalled ```r@3.4.0.```  I am now seeking to reinstall all of my existing r-packages with that new version of R.

These are the versions of R I have present:

```
[root@node118 spack]# spack find -l -v r
==> 2 installed packages.
-- linux-rhel6-x86_64 / gcc@6.3.0 -------------------------------
byz35ko r@3.4.0+X~external-lapack  gcdpgbm r@3.4.0+X~external-lapack

```

When I try to add a new package to ```byz35ko```

```
[root@node118 spack]# spack install r-igraph ^/byz35ko
==> Error: Package jpeg not found.
```

When I try for the newly-installed ```gcdpgbm```

```
[root@node118 spack]# spack install r-igraph ^/gcdpgbm
==> Error: Package glib has no variant set(['patches'])!

```

Spec:

```

Input spec
--------------------------------
r-igraph
    ^r@3.4.0%gcc@6.3.0+X~external-lapack arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@6.3.0+shared arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^cairo@1.14.8%gcc@6.3.0+X arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^fontconfig@2.12.3%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^font-util@1.3.1%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^freetype@2.7.1%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^libpng@1.6.29%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                        ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@6.3.0+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^libxml2@2.9.4%gcc@6.3.0~python arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^xz@5.2.3%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^glib@2.53.1%gcc@6.3.0~libmount patches=c325997b72a205ad1638bb3e3ba0e5b73e3d32ce63b2d0d3282f3e3a2ff4663c arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@6.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2 patches=9acdb4e73f67c241b5ef32505c9ddf7cf6884ca8ea661692f21dca28483b04b8 +tar+xz arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@6.3.0 patches=4110a40613b800da2b2888c352b64c75a82809d48341061e4de5861e8b28423f,f84b2708a42777aadcc7f502a261afe10ca5646a51c1ef8b5e60d2070d926b57 ~symlinks arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^tar@1.29%gcc@6.3.0 patches=08921fcbd732050c74ddf1de7d8ad95ffdbc09f8b4342456fa2f6a0dd02a957c,5c314db58d005043bf407abaf25eb9823b9032a22fd12a0b142d4bf548130fa4,d428578be7fb99b831eb61e53b8d88a859afe08b479a21238180899707d79ce4,e34d2470461037933737c0a60fbcc5d5ea905fefb6b414b4a2e88a440fcae23a arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^libffi@3.2.1%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^pcre@8.40%gcc@6.3.0~jit+utf arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^perl@5.24.1%gcc@6.3.0+cpanm+shared arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^gdbm@1.13%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                        ^readline@7.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libx11@1.6.5%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^kbproto@1.0.7%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^libxcb@1.12%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^libpthread-stubs@0.4%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^libxau@1.0.8%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                        ^xproto@7.0.31%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^libxdmcp@1.1.2%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^xextproto@7.3.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libxext@1.3.3%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libxrender@0.9.10%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^renderproto@0.11.1%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^pixman@0.34.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^curl@7.56.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^nghttp2@1.26.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^openssl@1.0.2k%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^icu4c@58.2%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^jdk@8u141-b15%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^libjpeg-turbo@1.5.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^libtiff@4.0.8%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^libxt@1.1.5%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libice@1.0.9%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libsm@1.2.2%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^pango@1.40.3%gcc@6.3.0+X arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^gobject-introspection@1.49.2%gcc@6.3.0 patches=6f90bb267efa043ed70b900b4b8e2faf9e8133afae311893b01060356ea81bba arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                ^python@2.7.14%gcc@6.3.0 patches=123082ab3483ded78e86d7c809e98a804b3465b4683c96bd79a2fd799f572244 +pic+shared~tk~ucs4 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
                    ^sqlite@3.20.0%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^harfbuzz@1.4.6%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
            ^libxft@2.3.2%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^tcl@8.6.6%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 
        ^tk@8.6.6%gcc@6.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64 

Normalized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Package glib has no variant set(['patches'])!
```

**It seems that I need R@3.4.1** though as concretization works...  Has anyone ran into this type of issue before?  How can I mitigate?  If I cannot reinstall R@3.4.0 with existing packages then that means I must force users to go to 3.4.1.  I am sure they can but I don't think I should be making them take that step.
